@TigaMaskman Well maybe there wasn't much bonding in the last chapter, but there were 'bonds', no? Well, bad attempts at jokes aside, it's simply a fetishized trope. As for best gurl: Yuuki! I do like emotionless girls though.

Wait...That's it! Oh well, it's been fun. So who's your favourite girl in this work? I choose Chie (1st girl who lacks brain) simply because she's the most huggable of them all. I like Yuuki (2nd girl who lack courage) too but this 3rd girl, Her name is Kokoro, is she? her story is pretty weak & rush compare to previous chapter(They actually bonding 'n stuff before they get right to it unlike 3rd chapter), i can barely cares about her at all and her emotionless personality doesn't help anything either. What a shame...Then again, it just my opinion. What about you guys?
